_description: Gospel for Monday after Fourth Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Ihesu crist descended forto cumTo a cete þat hight capharnaum…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And moder of all cristen menþat way to heuyn wele will vs ken
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Prope erat pascha iudeorum.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia ii post dominicam iiii quadragesime secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 55va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.110-114.
